#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

ASF supports the following library and tags.

{{{
xmlns:ui="http:*//java.sun.com/jsf/facelets"
}}}

=== <ui:composition> ===

{{{

}}}

}}}

=== <ui:define> ===

{{{

}}}

=== <ui:include> ===

</ui:include>
}}}

=== <ui:insert> ===

  ...
</ui:insert>
}}}
